memory.trailing.trail.chunck

Class StoredLongChunckTrail

  • java.lang.Object
    • memory.trailing.trail.chunck.StoredLongChunckTrail
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IStorage, IStoredLongTrail, ITrailStorage

    public class StoredLongChunckTrail
extends Object
implements IStoredLongTrail
    Implementing storage of historical values for backtrackable integers.
    See Also:
    IStorage, Serialized Form
